programme.title: Carrie, (1976, Horror)
programme.desc: In this all-time horror classic, Carrie (Sissy Spacek) is a loner with no confidence and no friends. When pushed too far, Carrie becomes a vengeance-seeking powerhouse who causes all hell to break loose in a frenzy of blood, fire and brimstone!

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry, and all hope looks to be lost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom's Assassination!

programme.title: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!

programme.title: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile, the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Execution Begins! Luffy's Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!

programme.title: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape, which involves some parting of ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hats Great Escape Begins!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!

programme.title: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!

programme.title: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses, and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!

programme.title: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!

programme.title: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!

programme.title: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure

programme.title: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm, which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffys Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn't this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom's meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!

programme.title: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom, but that's when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri's next move, but Katakuri's attacks keep pulling him down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!

programme.title: The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!

programme.title: Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: As a result of a new medical technique, an agent is able to surgically take on the identical appearance of a criminal in order to take down his terrorist organization.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: As young Texas rangers, Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call join an ill-conceived effort to capture Santa Fe and annex New Mexico.
programme.sub-title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk: Part 1

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: As young Texas rangers, Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call join an ill-conceived effort to capture Santa Fe and annex New Mexico.
programme.sub-title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk: Part 2

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: As young Texas rangers, Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call join an ill-conceived effort to capture Santa Fe and annex New Mexico.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Revlver
programme.desc: O jogador Jake Green entra em um jogo com consequncias potencialmente mortais.

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte
programme.desc: Um policial disfarado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiana entrar em campo, mas tem dvidas se ela tem o que preciso para completar a misso.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Espantalho
programme.desc: Amigos presos encontram espantalhos sobrenaturais em uma fazenda isolada.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo
programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: A Cura
programme.desc: Um executivo enviado para resgatar o CEO de sua empresa de um misterioso centro de bem-estar.

programme.title: O Espelho
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmo, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenmeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: Laurie Strode levada ao hospital, aps supostamente matar o responsvel pelo assassinato de diversas pessoas em Haddonfield, Illinois.

programme.title: Cdigo Mortal
programme.desc: A problemtica policial Billie Palmer comanda uma fora-tarefa que tenta impedir uma onda de crimes de um serial killer. Com a ajuda de uma equipe composta por especialistas e religiosos, ela corre contra o tempo e seus conflitos para resolver o caso.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Infidelidade
programme.desc: Um encontro secreto. Um homem trai sua esposa. Uma mulher trai o marido. E ento tudo comea a dar errado rapidamente.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: O Dom Da Premonio
programme.desc: Uma cartomante com percepo extra-sensorial convidada a ajudar a encontrar uma jovem que desapareceu misteriosamente.

programme.title: A Hospedeira
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: Ameaa no Espao
programme.desc: Na iminncia da paternidade, um mecnico jnior a bordo de uma arca interestelar para a Nova Terra precisa enganar um terror csmico malvolo que pretende usar a espaonave como arma.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Os Sobreviventes
programme.desc: Quando a jovem Kate Mitra encontra um planeta habitvel para o resto da humanidade, ela e sua tripulao fazem um teste, mas uma chuva de meteoros atinge a nave e eles so forados a pousar em um local desconhecido.

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da populao americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo pas em busca de um refgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: O Esconderijo
programme.desc: Dave e a esposa Amy encontram uma casa perfeita. Tudo lindo at que eles descobrem que os tijolos esto cheios de herona. Encurralados por criminosos, eles percebem que podem perder no s a residncia, mas tambm suas vidas.

programme.title: O Acerto
programme.desc: Quando o empresrio de tecnologia Ryan Black retorna sua cidade natal aps o funeral de seu pai, ele relutantemente se rene com um antigo colega do crime.

programme.title: A Fivela de Abner Outlaw
programme.desc: Durante uma terrvel tempestade, um serial killer causa estragos dentro de uma priso do Texas.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: O ltimo assalto
programme.desc: Trs idosos veteranos do crime decidem participar de um roubo a um cofre subterrneo do depsito de jias Hatton Garden, em Londres. Com uma furadeira industrial, os criminosos planejam entrar para a Histria atravessando as paredes do cofre em dois dias.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Co de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Honra
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficaro do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos comearem.

programme.title: Perseguio Explosiva
programme.desc: Um dubl se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma srie de aventuras perigosas e incrveis.

programme.title: Carros Usados, Vendedores Pirados!
programme.desc: Don Ready (Jeremy Piven) e sua louca equipe de negociadores tm apenas um fim de semana para se livrar de mais de 200 carros e provar que, quando se trata de persuaso, conspirao e todo tipo de mau comportamento, eles manjam do negcio!

programme.title: Os Espartalhes
programme.desc: Pardia de "300" e outros filmes. O rei Lenidas e seu exrcito de 12 homens lutam contra Xerxes da Prsia para defender a liberdade de Esparta.

programme.title: O Grande Dave
programme.desc: Tripulao de aliens em miniatura opera uma nave espacial com forma humana.

programme.title: Endiabrado
programme.desc: Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: A Justiceira
programme.desc: Ela uma professora antiquada, que inspira os alunos de uma cidadezinha. Mas eles no sabem que o passatempo favorito dela fazer justia com as prprias mos.

programme.title: O Casamento dos Meus Sonhos
programme.desc: Mary Fiore a planejadora de casamentos de maior prestgio em So Francisco. Ela est to ocupada realizando os sonhos de outras pessoas que no tem tempo para lidar com sua prpria vida.

programme.title: Show de Vizinha
programme.desc: Um estudante do ensino mdio se apaixona por sua vizinha, e descobre que ela uma atriz porn.

programme.title: Sorte no Amor
programme.desc: Ashley, uma mulher sortuda, troca sua sorte pela do Jake, que est na pior.

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva
programme.desc: Um casal tem uma grande surpresa quando sua filha anuncia seu casamento no dia da sua boda de prata.

programme.title: Amor e Outras Drogas
programme.desc: Maggie e Jamie comeam um relacionamento que os confronta com a doena e a droga do amor.

programme.title: Sobre o Amor. Somente Para Adultos
programme.desc: O filme se passa em Moscou no vero. Pessoas que tm pressa em seus negcios importantes e tambm no se esquecem da aquisio de novos conhecimentos e habilidades.

programme.title: A Fora do Destino
programme.desc: O solitrio Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) entra na Escola de Oficiais para se tornar piloto da Marinha e em treze semanas torturantes, ele aprende a importncia da disciplina, do amor e da amizade.

programme.title: No O Tipo Da Cinderela
programme.desc: Indy acha que sua vida est bem at que ela conhece um novo cara que a ajuda a descobrir quem ela e o que ela vale.

programme.title: Obsesso
programme.desc: Simone herda uma casa de campo e vai at l com sua famlia. Seu sonho renovar a casa, mas medida que a reconstruo comea, ela cai no caos. Ela deve encontrar seu caminho de volta para os sonhos que a levaram para l em primeiro lugar.

programme.title: A Fera
programme.desc: Uma verso moderna da histria de A Bela e a Fera, onde um adolescente em Nova York se transforma em um monstro horrvel para encontrar o amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Sobrou Pra Voc
programme.desc: Abbie e Robert so amigos com muita coisa em comum: jovens, tm uma viso no-convencional da vida, inteligentes, impulsivos e um terrvel azar no amor. Eles fariam um par perfeito, se no houvesse um problema: Robert gay.

programme.title: A Fora do Destino
programme.desc: O solitrio Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) entra na Escola de Oficiais para se tornar piloto da Marinha e em treze semanas torturantes, ele aprende a importncia da disciplina, do amor e da amizade.

programme.title: O Menino do Pijama Listrado
programme.desc: Uma amizade proibida se forma entre Bruno, o filho de um comandante nazista, e Schmuel, um menino judeu mantido prisioneiro em um campo de concentrao.

programme.title: O Duelo
programme.desc: Um Ranger do Texas est investigando uma srie de mortes inexplicveis em uma cidade chamada Helena.

programme.title: Em Busca de Vingana
programme.desc: Um homem traumatizado busca vingana aps ter perdido a esposa e o filho em acidente de avio causado por negligncia de um controlador de trfego areo. Inspirado no acidente de berlingen, no qual os passageiros eram em sua maioria crianas.

programme.title: A ltima Fortaleza
programme.desc: Seu servio ao seu pas o tornou um heri. Um erro o tornou prisioneiro. Para o General Eugene Irwin (Redford), apenas uma questo de cumprir sua sentena, at que ele descobre que seus colegas de cela esto sendo assassinatos.

programme.title: Swingers
programme.desc: Apesar da natureza insegura de Diana, ela e seu marido Julian concordam com a ideia de fazer experincias sexuais com outro parceiro e colocar um anncio online.

programme.title: Amor, Sexo & Pandemia
programme.desc: Uma viso sobre a epidemia e a solido em que vivemos. O fato de termos acesso cada vez mais fcil ao sexo sem sexo, temos um problema crescente em construir uma relao de proximidade e amor com outro ser humano.

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo
programme.desc: Aps assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como refns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Gringo, Reze para Morrer
programme.desc: frente de uma dzia de bandidos, dois irmos mantm a pequena cidade de White City sob controle. Finalmente, porm, um caador de recompensas, com a ajuda de um aleijado, tenta libertar White City de seus ferozes opressores.

programme.title: Jake Grando
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que j viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ao quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoo. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e no terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Terra Bruta
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendrio John Ford une-se estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a histria tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o territrio dos Comanches para resgatar refns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: A Fuga
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: O Fantasma
programme.desc: A histria comea como uma expedio ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raa humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!
